title: City Light Stadium
text:
The , known from 2010 to February 2015 as , and before that as is a <a href="multi-purpose%20stadium">multi-purpose stadium</a> in <a href="Okayama">Okayama</a>, <a href="Japan">Japan</a>. It is currently used mostly for <a href="football%20%28soccer%29">football</a> matches and <a href="Athletics%20%28sport%29">athletics</a> events. It is the home field of <a href="Fagiano%20Okayama">Fagiano Okayama</a>, and used for some <a href="rugby%20union">rugby union</a> <a href="Top%20League">Top League</a> games.
The stadium's capacity is 20,000 people.
Before the naming rights were acquired by and then , the venue's nickname was ".
